Issue.creator: vladimirwork
Issue.summary: Rewrite some skipped post-installation tests and add new instead of skipped
Issue.description: We have 33 skipped post-installation tests due to Indy-SDK API changes. At least 10 of them (parameterized schema_invalid_test.py with 2 test cases against 5 parameters each) can be rewritten from scratch based on schema_json with various parameters returned from anoncreds module. Also new tests can be added instead of skipped ones due to removed / completely reworked SDK methods.
